title: ASIA CEMENT CH (00743.HK) Warns of Loss in 1Q-3Q Results
content:
SHOW:  STOCK INFO  SHORT SELL 

ASIA CEMENT CH (00743.HK)  -0.050 (-2.024%)    Short selling $28.52K; Ratio 4.727%    issued a profit warning, expecting to record a net loss for the nine months ending 30 September 2015 as compared to a net profit in the year-ago period. The expected loss was mainly attributable to the decrease in average selling price of the company’s products and the foreign exchange loss from US dollar-denominated bank borrowings as a result of the devaluation of RMB. 

(Quote is delayed for at least 15 mins.Short Selling Data as at 2015-09-11 16:25.)
